unnormalised: Just a reminder for everyone applying for jobs and internships: Keep your education details and work experience handy. For example, you might need to quickly provide your roll no. from college, like 20BCE1234, or your employee ID from your previous company, say TCS123456. Also, many applications now ask for your LinkedIn profile URL, something like linkedin.com/in/yourname123. And don't forget, your PAN card number, such as ABCDE1234F, might be required for certain registration processes.
normalised: just a reminder for everyone applying for jobs and internships: keep your education details and work experience handy. for example, you might need to quickly provide your roll number from college, like two zero B C E one two three four, or your employee I D from your previous company, say T C S one two three four five six. also, many applications now ask for your LinkedIn profile U R L, something like linkedin dot com slash in slash yourname one two three. and don't forget, your P A N card number, such as A B C D E one two three four F, might be required for certain registration processes.
